channel.description: Foreword Configuration management: enforcing declared state across your infrastructure procedural application deployment broad multi-component and multi-system orchestration of complicated interconnected systems. Modern infrastructure management Ansible Examples Examples: https://github.com/geerlingguy/ansible-for-devops Other resources Ansible Documentation - Covers all Ansible options in depth. There are few open source projects with documentation as clear and thorough. Ansible on GitHub - The official Ansible code repository, where the magic happens. Ansible Example Playbooks on GitHub - Many examples for common server configurations. Getting Started with Ansible - A simple guide to Ansibleâ€™s community and resources. Ansible Blog
